CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Product2.Category__c) == 'Yarn', ((UnitPrice * Quantity) -((UnitPrice * Quantity) * Discount)) + (((UnitPrice * Quantity) -((UnitPrice * Quantity) * Discount))* 0.12 ), ((UnitPrice * Quantity) -((UnitPrice * Quantity) * Discount)) + (((UnitPrice * Quantity) -((UnitPrice * Quantity) * Discount))* 0.18 ))
CustomField.label: GST Price
